name: Slasher U: An 18+ Horror Movie Dating Sim, Act 1
name_original: Slasher U: An 18+ Horror Movie Dating Sim, Act 1
description:
WELCOME TO AMERICA'S HORNIEST HORROR MOVIE UNIVERSITY!
SLASHER U is a 90's inspired, 18+ reactive dating sim with (optionally toggleable) full-blown sex mechanics and minigames, an open-world explorable 2D map, a huge story-rich branching narrative based on dynamic Character Feelings systems, gothy y2k-inspired hand-drawn art, and TONS of balls-to-the-wall horror movie theming based on the vibrant history of horror from the 90's, 2000's, and beyond!

Everyone's* favorite indie horror movie dating sim that punches you in the face with dick jokes AND pathos is now on Steam! Act 1 includes 15+ hours of content across 5 romance arcs!
*punching mileage may vary

*****THIS GAME IS MEANT FOR ADULTS AGED 18 AND ABOVE*******

Wall o' Reviews

WHO YA GONNA KISS?



HEXECUTIONER JONES-MACDUFF
A legacy admit thrust into the life of a masked slasher by his overbearing dads, Hex is a frat boy himbo with a heart of gold who wants nothing more than to wear slides all day, smoke weed, make friends, and listen to ICP.


JUNO "JU-ON" PARK
Antagonistic, thrillseeking, and completely unable to connect with their emotions in a genuine way, Juno puts the FUCK in FUCK YOU. What, that doesn't count as a joke? You wanna fight about it? Or like, kiss about it? Or talk about my fucked-up family and how they impacted how I see myself and my place in the world about it?


LAILA VELASQUEZ
Putting the "Final Girl" in "Girlboss", Laila Velasquez is top at everything: Top of her class, top in the bedroom, and top at trying to get the rest of these assholes to appreciate just how much work she puts into being THIS perfect.


SAWYER FERGUSON
Undergrad masked murderer who's now in law school, Sawyer just can't shake the fact that he liked chasing co-eds down with a chainsaw a little TOO much. For a guy who's struggling to be the most consensual slasher in existence, can he have his cake (you) and stab it too (hopefully not you, unless you're into that)?


TATE MCGILLICUTTY
An A/V nerd with a big, dark, Eldritch secret, Tate's favorite things are video editing, substance abuse, losing his shit on set, and processing his trauma through the lens of B-movies. Not necessarily in that order.

Major Features

  • 15+ HOURS (3+ hours per romance arc!) of RPG style gameplay with items, unlocks, quest chains, story choices & story puzzles, etc, all revolving around the main romances
  • Dynamic Feelings Systems for each character that keeps track of everyone's feelings for you, based on their "memories", that trigger the story in a modular way for a different playthrough every time!
  • Makeout minigames unique to each character!
  • Full blown sex minigames unique to each character!
  • Five dateable characters (so far), tons of flirtable cuties. (The Slasher U fanbase has an ongoing vote for who the Next Romanceable Character is, and currently Headless Horsemike is in the lead! Go Mike!)
  • Full optional story-integrated polyamory (or, if you're an asshole, uncommunicative cheating!)
  • Fully art’ed hand-drawn characters with a bevy of reacts!
  • Collectible cosmetics, including wearable outfits, phone skins, and more!
  • 90’s inspired open-world adventure game map in All-American Murder College Theming!
  • Kink-positive romances (and vanilla ones, too)!
  • Toggle between R-Rated and Hard Explicit 18+ at any time for all my aces out there (and twitch streamers) with no gameplay or romance penalty; plenty of stage-based consent checks for The Weird Shit. Also, enjoy the Weird Shit!
  • Every relationship is written with a full spectrum of orientations in mind, including pretty much every configuration of LGBTQIA+ as well as hetero relationships (so everyone's technically playersexual, but each romance/experience differs based on wlw/mlm/ostensibly bi/ostensibly het/etc player+romance partner mechanics; characters also have specific preferences).
  • Tons of fun gender stuff like character creation having separate gender and sex options!
  • Evolving relationships with plenty of models, systems, and interlocking storylines and quests, from pursuing your crush to relationship life (or undeath, your call)
  • Bonus Slasher U minigames that’re horror/slasher/college themed, like Hallway Sprinting 101, Bartending, and Student Hunting 101
  • An homage to scary movies and a serious attempt by the OP to make a well-balanced, reactive, romantic, emotionally pathos-laden, and contextually satisfying sexy dating sim (with tons of y2k style dick jokes)
